content: I am a Ph.D. student in the Institute of Computational Physics and Complex Systems at Lanzhou University. My Ph.D adviser is Zhi-Xi Wu. I am also a visiting scholar hosted by Filippo Radicchi in the School of Informatics, Computing, and Engineering at Indiana University Bloomington.

title: Yi-Jiao Zhang
Advantage of Being Multicomponent and Spatial: Multipartite Viruses Colonize Structured Populations with Lower Thresholds
